subject: Missing VAM clutch pedal adpater plate
description_text:
Hello, just got my VAM motors delivered today. The two throttle and brake
adapter plates are in the package but the clutch plate is missing. Anyway
you can ship that to me?

I ordered this from Amazon:

My address is:
Ben Harding
17770 Evenston Rd, Eden Prairie, MN 55346



[image: image.png]

conversations.body_text: Hi Ben Harding,  I am sorry for it, we will ship it ASAP.Â
